tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Well to begin with we all need a doctor who can listen to us calmly,examine carefull and explain to us whats the issue in a simpler and effective manner and doctor John paul succeds in all those categories. All a patient needs is trusted assurance and treated well which you can find over here.

tags: None
review: I had been to the hospital and it was for throat infection. The doctor was friendly and good. He understood my concern and treated me well. Medicine and syrup was prescribed by the doctor. After 2-3 weeks I was fine. Waiting time was only 10- 15 minutes. I am satisfied with the treatment given.   I can recommend the doctor to my family or friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
The doctor was patient with my explanation of the symptoms.
Asked minimal, but relevant questions. 
Communicated well with me about the problem & his recommended treatment. 
Additionally, the nursing staff were nice and welcoming.


I only wish the staff at the Reception/Billing desk at the entrance have a more welcoming vibe than they currently exhibit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Patiently heard all the issues and explained his thought. We are happy and satisfied. Looking for the next appointment after the blood test.

tags: None
review: The doctor listens to you patiently, and treats not just the illness, but also the person. He did not recommend a load of drugs, but suggested practical tips to contain the problem. Highly recommended

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Good and responsible doctor. Good in communication. He builds confidence to the attendants over phone with updates. 
We are happy about him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had vivid. John Dr & others treated me. He explains the problem in a layman language so that we understand what is the issue. We just went for consultation and he checked all the reports if everything looks good. ** ** * ***** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He was patient to listen to me and answered all my questions in detail. He also explained the why some tests are done and what should be my health goal. He is pretty cool.

tags: None
review: I had met the doctor as I was suffering from fever. ********* *** **** ** *** ******* I am good now. Medicine was not prescribed by the doctor. There was no waiting time in the hospital. Hospitality was good.

tags: None
review: We visited the hospital and it was for my mother. She had stomach pain. She was admitted there. ********* *** ****. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. Blood tests were done. Waiting time was not there. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend the doctor to my family or friends. She got expired recently. Hospitality was clean and good.
